query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Cloud Infrastructure Incentives Management and Data Governance: Design and Open Specification 1
result.description: This report will provide the first version of the design of the cloud gateways and the cloud provisioning approaches to ensure utilization of cloud resources as required for the PolicyCLOUD environment. It will also provide the algorithms implementing the incentives management as well as the data governance model and the specification of the tools used to ensure compliance to the model across the complete data path.

project.title: Policy Management through technologies across the complete data lifecycle on cloud environments.

result.title: Requirements for reference plant modifications for installation of sCO2-4-NPP
result.description: In this deliverable NRI and EDF will provide the set of requirements for the implementation of the system in the nuclear power plant (NPP) in selected reactor type (VVER for NRI and PWR for EDF). This deliverable will provide the necessary data to identify the required system functions critical to other system devices, interfaces and the overall plant.

project.title: INNOVATIVE SCO2-BASED HEAT REMOVAL TECHNOLOGY FOR AN INCREASED LEVEL OF SAFETY OF NUCLEAR POWER PLANTS

result.title: Summary of 4th open innovation and project emergence workshop
result.description: Within the scope of the fourth event, an open innovation workshop will be organized to allow the emergence of project ideas from the the members of the start-up ecosystems, the corporate players and generally speaking the stakeholders of the considered applicative domain. A summary of the workshop will be created, focusing on presenting the possibilities to transform the emerging ideas into collaborative projects and the opportunities for European start-up.

result.title: Best practices guide (scale start-up, fundraising, open innovation)
result.description: The information and data accumulated during the project by the partners will be compiled in a best practices guide for scaling start-up. The guide will include the methods followed by the members of the consortium, the validation procedures, and their (measurable and potential) impact, the feedback from the interactions with the members of the start-up hubs, the best practices in terms of scale-up procedures, fundraising and open innovation, potentially interesting to other start-up ecosystems.

result.title: "Project Newsletter #3"
result.description: A project newsletter will be published twice a year [M6, M12, M18, M24, M30, M36, M42] to inform the active stakeholders and policy makers about the background of the project, its scientific and training outputs, as well as policy recommendations, but also to mobilize them to actively participate in the project’s conferences and training sessions and in the Technical and Financial Support Instrument.

result.title: "Project Newsletter #5"
result.description: A project newsletter will be published twice a year [M6, M12, M18, M24, M30, M36, M42] to inform the active stakeholders and policy makers about the background of the project, its scientific and training outputs, as well as policy recommendations, but also to mobilize them to actively participate in the project’s conferences and training sessions and in the Technical and Financial Support Instrument.

result.title: "Communication and dissemination strategy update #1"
result.description: The project’s communication and dissemination strategy will be developed in the first six months, then monitored and updated on a yearly basis (M18, M30 and M42) during the project in light of its achievements (number of people reached, satisfaction rates, etc.).
